headline.main: U.S. Second-Quarter GDP on Track to Grow 0.9 Percent: Atlanta Fed
headline.print_headline: U.S. Second-Quarter GDP on Track to Grow 0.9 Percent: Atlanta Fed

docs.snippet: The U.S. economy is on course to expand 0.9 percent in the second quarter, a forecast model from the Atlanta Federal Reserve showed on Thursday, after the government's estimate on first-quarter growth came in at a paltry 0.2 percent....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. economy is on course to expand 0.9 percent in the second quarter, a forecast model from the Atlanta Federal Reserve showed on Thursday, after the government's estimate on first-quarter growth came in at a paltry 0.2 percent.

headline.main: Study: Global Warming to Push 1 in 13 Species to Extinction
headline.print_headline: Study: Global Warming to Push 1 in 13 Species to Extinction

docs.snippet: Global warming will eventually push 1 out of every 13 species on Earth into extinction, a new study projects....
docs.lead_paragraph: Global warming will eventually push 1 out of every 13 species on Earth into extinction, a new study projects.

headline.main: Documentary on T-Rex Discovery Leads to Pardon Request
headline.print_headline: Documentary on T-Rex Discovery Leads to Pardon Request

docs.snippet: The paleontologist who unearthed the largest and most complete Tyrannosaurus rex ever found is pushing for President Barack Obama to pardon his 20-year-old federal conviction....
docs.lead_paragraph: The paleontologist who unearthed the largest and most complete Tyrannosaurus rex ever found is pushing for President Barack Obama to pardon his 20-year-old federal conviction.

headline.main: IG: IRS Takes Significant Steps to Stop Tea Party Targeting
headline.print_headline: IG: IRS Takes Significant Steps to Stop Tea Party Targeting

docs.snippet: A government watchdog says the IRS has taken significant steps to stop agents from targeting political groups based on their names and policy positions....
docs.lead_paragraph: A government watchdog says the IRS has taken significant steps to stop agents from targeting political groups based on their names and policy positions.

headline.main: Colombia's High Court Urges Probe of Ex-President Uribe
headline.print_headline: Colombia's High Court Urges Probe of Ex-President Uribe

docs.snippet: Colombia's Supreme Court has handed down stiff prison sentences to two close aides of former President Alvaro Uribe for organizing a spying ring that illegally intercepted the communications of the conservative leader's top opponents....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia's Supreme Court has handed down stiff prison sentences to two close aides of former President Alvaro Uribe for organizing a spying ring that illegally intercepted the communications of the conservative leader's top opponents.

headline.main: Lawsuit: Educational Cadavers Mishandled at Chicago College
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit: Educational Cadavers Mishandled at Chicago College

docs.snippet: A doctor has filed a lawsuit against City Colleges of Chicago, claiming he was fired in retaliation for raising questions about four unidentified, decomposing cadavers stored in boxes in a locked, unrefrigerated closet....
docs.lead_paragraph: A doctor has filed a lawsuit against City Colleges of Chicago, claiming he was fired in retaliation for raising questions about four unidentified, decomposing cadavers stored in boxes in a locked, unrefrigerated closet.

headline.main: MoMA to Offer Free Events for Seniors
headline.print_headline: New MoMA Plan For Older New Yorkers

docs.snippet: A new program at the Museum of Modern Art will include free screenings, online courses and other events for New York City residents 65 and older....
docs.abstract: A new program at the Museum of Modern Art will include free screenings, online courses and other events for New York City residents 65 and older.

headline.main: Judge Blocks Release of Couple in Drug Money Laundering Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Release of Couple in Drug Money Laundering Case

docs.snippet: Federal prosecutors are seeking to block a Texas magistrate judge's order allowing the release of a couple accused of laundering cartel drug money at a small southwest Kansas bank....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors are seeking to block a Texas magistrate judge's order allowing the release of a couple accused of laundering cartel drug money at a small southwest Kansas bank.

headline.main: Middle School Student Rebuked for Wearing Rosary to Class
headline.print_headline: Middle School Student Rebuked for Wearing Rosary to Class

docs.snippet: A middle school student in northwest New Mexico says she was sent to the principal's office and asked if she sold drugs or was involved with a gang after she wore her rosary to school....
docs.lead_paragraph: A middle school student in northwest New Mexico says she was sent to the principal's office and asked if she sold drugs or was involved with a gang after she wore her rosary to school.
